body_html: Hi @ddurham2, thanks for reporting this. We fixed this in #8301, but unfortunately it looks like it still hasn't been pushed to the documentation site. Once r1.2 becomes the standard version however, the site will be correct (see https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.2/tutorials/layers#pooling_layer_1).
body_text: Hi @ddurham2, thanks for reporting this. We fixed this in #8301, but unfortunately it looks like it still hasn't been pushed to the documentation site. Once r1.2 becomes the standard version however, the site will be correct (see https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.2/tutorials/layers#pooling_layer_1).
body: Hi @ddurham2, thanks for reporting this. We fixed this in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/8301, but unfortunately it looks like it still hasn't been pushed to the documentation site. Once r1.2 becomes the standard version however, the site will be correct (see https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.2/tutorials/layers#pooling_layer_1).
